pr_title: Add demo user online and offline test

timeline.bodyText: this would need to be suppressed below Android 8 right ?
timeline.author: shubham1g5
timeline.diffHunk:

replies.bodyText: Thanks for catching this one. I totally missed it.
replies.author: ShivamPokhriyal

timeline.message: Prevent demo user offline tests to run above Android 10
